CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 收费；索价；起诉；控告；指控；指责；使承担责任；充电；给…充电；猛攻；冲锋；向前冲；为（枪）装弹药；装填（枪炮等）；赋予职责；委以重任；负载；加荷；（向某人）提出要求；（在盾牌或旗帜上）加上纹章标志；（将某事）归咎于；使充满（…情绪）
费用；（商品和服务所需的）要价；收费；充电量；电荷；责任；任务；主管；管理；照顾；指控；控告；指责；谴责；冲锋；突然猛冲；攻击；炸药量；装载量；纹章；徽章；装饰图案；托付的人；托付的物

synonym.mean: 费用；电荷；掌管；控告；命令；负载
使充电；使承担；指责；装载；对…索费；向…冲去
充电；控告；索价；向前冲；记在账上

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 应支付的；可以控诉的；可充电的；应课税的
充电器；军马；袭击者；委托者；控诉者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，正式或非正式场合，私人或法律上均可用。被指控的情节可轻可重。常与of连用。
常与accuse换用，但charge多指较严重的错误或罪行，而且往往向法庭提出正式起诉。
指上学、求医以及找律师等付的费用，还可指会费、借书费等。
常指实际支付的费用总数额，有时也指钱的花费。
指商品在市场出售的价格，尤指卖方对商品所提出的单价。比喻意义指付出的代价。
指提供服务时索取的费用，也指货物的价格、价钱。
侧重指旅行时所付的车、船费等费用。
指生产某东西的成本，也泛指商品的价格，可与price换用。

word_group.brief_definition: 控罪书；犯罪事实检举摘录

bilingual.source: Shoud not charge for lenses and frames too much.
bilingual.target: 不应该对镜片和镜架要价太多

bilingual.source: Many landlords charge too much rentals for much profit.
bilingual.target: 许多房东收取多利润而要价太多租金。

bilingual.source: Supermarkets often charge too much for goods. Avocados are a case in point.
bilingual.target: 超市的东西总是要价太高,鳄梨就是最好的例子.

bilingual.source: Another scalper said he'd charge $1000 for a $125 ticket .
bilingual.target: 另一个票贩子说125美元的票他要价1，000美元。

bilingual.source: Regarding why they choose to charge such high prices ... because they can.
bilingual.target: 至于为什么他们选择要价这么高..因为他们可以要得这么高。

bilingual.source: She knows she could charge more but doesn't, because her customers “are struggling just like me.
bilingual.target: 她知道她可以要价更多但是她没有，因为她的顾客“就像她一样在挣扎奋斗。”

bilingual.source: Many landlords charge too much rentals for much profit. And because of such intention his property may remain empty for months.
bilingual.target: 许多房东收取多利润而要价太多租金。而且由于有这样的企图，他的产业可能会保持数月的空屋。

bilingual.source: The economy has allowed us to get better deals. Now that we're aware and we know the pricing, we can say, 'You can't charge us this much.'
bilingual.target: 经济形势允许我们获得更好的交易，现在我们能意识到并且也能知道价格，我们能够说，‘你不可能收对我们要价太高。’

bilingual.source: The economy has allowed us to get better deals. Now that we're aware and we know the pricing, we can say, 'You can't charge us this much. '
bilingual.target: 经济形势允许我们获得更好的交易，现在我们能意识到并且也能知道价格，我们能够说，‘你不可能收对我们要价太高。’

bilingual.source: Be careful. Those grasping taxi - drivers might charge you too much.
bilingual.target: "小心点, 那些贪婪的出租汽车司机会向你漫天要价的.

list.abstract: charge，英文单词，作名词、动词，翻译为装卸、控诉、索价、记在账上、使充电等。

yingyinNormal.en: Other people, let me sell the product for 2.5 and charge 2.5 for shipping.
yingyinNormal.zh: 向令一部分人要价2.5美金邮费2.5美金。

yingyinNormal.en: It felt good to take charge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 主动权在我手里的感觉真好。

yingyinNormal.en: Either charge me or release me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要么起诉我，要么放了我。

yingyinNormal.en: You're in charge of the potatoes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们要负责土豆。

yingyinNormal.en: Send him back. Charge the drivers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 送他回去，驱动通电。

yingyinNormal.en: And if you want to test his DNA, charge him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们如果想采集他的DNA，先起诉他。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, Super Capacitors would charge way faster.
yingyinNormal.zh: 超级电容器充电速度更快。

yingyinNormal.en: In charge of keeping the system moving is Ye Guangguan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 负责系统运行的是叶广观。

yingyinNormal.en: Their mother's in Rikers for an unregistered weapons charge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们的母亲在里克岛监狱，罪名是非法持有未注册枪械。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, you're not in charge. It's my idea. I'm in charge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，这个并不是你负责的，这是我的点子，我才是负责的。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're a go-getter, ramrod. Take charge kind of guy. I'm a killer, a stone cold killer. So, take charge guy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你是个野心家，勇往直前，有控制欲的人？我像个杀手、冷血杀手。是有控制欲的人？

yingyinNormal.en: They say you were in charge. It isn't true. I was just one of the guards. She was in charge. She was. Of course she was.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她们说你是主管。这不是事实。我只不过是看守中的一员。她是主管。没错！是她的主意。她当然是。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, that's cause I'm in charge of cups and ice. And Monica's gonna rue the day that she put me in charge of cups and ice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，这是因为我负责杯子冰块，莫妮卡在这一天将后悔莫及，因为她要我负责杯子冰块。

yingyinNormal.en: Green Bean, meet Newt. When I'm not around, he's in charge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 新来的，他是纽特，我不在的时候，他就是头儿。

yingyinNormal.en: I believe I am entitled to be in charge of my own life now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我相信我有权利对自己的生活负责。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, why am I in charge of phone support? Seems a bit racist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为何我负责的是电话服务？貌似有点种族主义。

yingyinNormal.en: Dear God. Are you really thinking of putting the fox in charge?
yingyinNormal.zh: 上帝，我们真的要让这只老狐狸来做主吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Waiting for us at the creek is Raj, he's in charge of our safety.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在河上等着我们的是拉杰，他会负责我们的安全问题。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: And my wheelchair power pack that won't charge in a French socket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我轮椅的电池也没法在法国的插座上充电。

yingyinNormal.en: Take charge, Viking, barbarian. Of course, it's me. Pow! I'm here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爱掌控，维京海盗，野蛮人，对，这些都是我，我就是这样。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 责任; 承担; 负责

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a price asked for goods or services

examination_example.sentence: France leads the <highlight>charge</highlight> on Digital Tax.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国率先征收数字税。

examination_example.sentence: Now, rivals will be <highlight>charging</highlight> sales tax where they hadn't before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，竞争对手将在此地征收此前从未征收过的销售税。

examination_example.sentence: Amazon.com, with its network of warehouses, also collects sales tax in every state that <highlight>charges</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拥有仓库网络的亚马逊也在每个征收销售税的州征收该税。

sense_info_list.en: an accusation, typically one formally made against a prisoner brought to trial

examination_example.sentence: Exempt from conviction on the <highlight>charge</highlight> of favoritism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因徇私指控而免于定罪。

examination_example.sentence: Rebekah Brooks, innocent of the same <highlight>charge</highlight> — the wider issue of dearth of integrity still stands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Rebekah Brooks没有受到同样的指控——更广泛的缺乏诚信的问题仍然存在。

examination_example.sentence: Andy Coulson should be held innocent of the <highlight>charge</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 安迪·库尔森应该被判无罪。

sense_info_list.en: the responsibility of taking care or control of someone or something
sense_info_list.zh: 责任; 承担; 负责

examination_example.sentence: A kind of "moral licensing" that allays our concerns and stops us doing more and asking more of those in <highlight>charge</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一种“道德许可”，它缓解我们的担忧，阻止我们做更多的事情，对相关负责人提出更多的要求。

examination_example.sentence: And if Peretti were in <highlight>charge</highlight> at the Times?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果Peretti来负责《纽约时报》呢？

sense_info_list.en: fill or pervade (something) with a quality or emotion

examination_example.sentence: But perhaps the most significant reason is that the issue has always been so politically <highlight>charged</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但或许最重要的原因是，这个问题总是充满政治色彩。

sense_info_list.en: publicly accuse someone of doing something bad
a person or thing entrusted to the care of someone
an official instruction, especially one given by a judge to a jury regarding points of law
record the cost of something as an amount payable by (someone) or on (an account)
rush forward

word_usage.usage: charge用作及物动词，表示“收费”时，通常与介词for连用，构成短语charge sb. for sth.，而表示“指控”通常与介词with连用，构成charge sb. with sth./with doing sth.。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 表示“费用；价钱”，指卖主或服务者为自己的服务或商品索要的价钱、报酬。
表示“成本；费用；价钱”，多指对要价的支付。
表示“费用；花费；开支”，常指为某物实际支付的金额总数，也可指各种花费，指金钱，也可包括时间、精力等。
表示“价格；定价；价钱”，主要指卖主给商品定的价格，一般都高于成本，也引申为做某事而付出的代价。
指“冲击”或“骑兵的突然攻击”。
指“围攻”即从各个方向攻击。
语气比assail强，指“突然猛烈地进攻”，暗示“武力的直接接触（如肉搏等）”，也有“暴力”的意思。
是常用词，指“攻击敌人”或“用言论攻击他人”。
指“猛烈连续地攻击”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 责任; 承担; 负责
填充量; 炸药量; 填充

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a price asked for goods or services

examination_example.sentence: Moves by Barcelona and Venice to deal with the phenomenon of "over-tourism" through the use of <highlight>charges</highlight> have recently gained prominence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴塞罗那和威尼斯通过收费来解决“过度旅游”现象的举措备受关注。

examination_example.sentence: Some UK cities have lobbied without success for the power to levy a <highlight>charge</highlight> on visitors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些英国城市曾游说，希望获得向游客收费的权力，但没有成功。

examination_example.sentence: The Himayalan kingdom of Bhutan has a longstanding policy of <highlight>charging</highlight> visitors a daily fee.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不丹的喜马拉雅王国长期以来都有向游客收取每日费用的政策。

examination_example.sentence: The Department for Education's guidance says schools can <highlight>charge</highlight> only for board and lodging if the trip is part of the syllabus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教育部给出的指导意见是，如果旅行是教学大纲的一部分，学校只能收取食宿费用。

sense_info_list.en: an accusation, typically one formally made against a prisoner brought to trial

examination_example.sentence: Psychologists have been battling <highlight>charges</highlight> that they don't do "real" science for some time—because many findings from classic experiments have proved unreproducible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一段时间以来，心理学家一直在与指责他们不做“真正的”科学的指控作斗争——因为许多经典实验的发现被证明是不可复制的。

sense_info_list.en: a person or thing entrusted to the care of someone

examination_example.sentence: It is also critical for socially <highlight>charged</highlight> neuroscience issues such as the therapeutic potential of stem cell therapy for regenerative diseases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对于社会所关注的神经科学问题也至关重要，例如再生疾病干细胞疗法的治疗潜力。

sense_info_list.en: the responsibility of taking care or control of someone or something
sense_info_list.zh: 责任; 承担; 负责

sense_info_list.en: a quantity of explosive to be detonated in order to fire a gun or similar weapon
sense_info_list.zh: 填充量; 炸药量; 填充

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指提供服务时索取的费用, 也指货物的价格、价钱。
指生产某东西的成本, 也泛指商品的价格, 可与 price 换用。
常指实际支付的费用总数额, 有时也指钱的花费。
侧重指旅行时所付的车、船费等费用。
普通用词, 正式或非正式场合, 私人或法律上均可用。被指控的情节可轻可重。常与 of 连用。
常与 accuse 换用, 但 charge 多指较严重的错误或罪行, 而且往往向法庭提出正式起诉。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 责任; 承担; 负责

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 骑士坐骑；骑兵战马；充电器；冲锋者；袭击者；大浅盘

word_family.mean: v. 要；收；要（人）支付；指责；控告；使承担；给（电池；电池装置）充电；冲锋；饰纹章于；冲

sense_info_list.en: a price asked for goods or services

examination_example.sentence: It is not clear how much they would <highlight>charge</highlight> for a cup.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前还不清楚他们的一杯咖啡收费多少钱。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>charged</highlight> a high price for their space-roasted coffee beans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的太空烘焙的咖啡豆要价很高。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>charge</highlight> a small fee on plastic products in supermarkets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超市对塑料制品收取少量费用。

sense_info_list.en: an accusation; typically one formally made against a prisoner brought to trial

examination_example.sentence: As for the Brazilian artist's work, the authorities were annoyed but could find nothing to <highlight>charge</highlight> him with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至于这位巴西艺术家的作品，当局很恼火，但找不到任何指控。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>charged</highlight> him with polluting tunnels in the city.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们指控他污染城市的隧道。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, the FBI received a tip that the stolen document was located very close to Washington, D. C. Their art crime team recovered the letter but were unable to press <highlight>charges</highlight> because the time of limitations had ended.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，联邦调查局(FBI)收到线索，被盗文件的位置离华盛顿特区非常近。他们的艺术犯罪小组找回了这封信，但由于诉讼时效已经结束，无法提出指控。

sense_info_list.en: the responsibility of taking care or control of someone or something
sense_info_list.zh: 责任; 承担; 负责

examination_example.sentence: The good news is, women are more likely than men to take <highlight>charge</highlight> of their stress and manage it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好消息是，女性比男性更有可能承担并管理自己的压力。

examination_example.sentence: Drivers should make sure they're prepared for their journey with warm clothing, food and drink, sufficient fuel and a <highlight>charged</highlight> mobile phone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 司机们应该确保他们已经为旅途做好准备，准备好保暖的衣服、食物和饮料、充足的燃料和充了电的手机。

sense_info_list.en: publicly accuse someone of doing something bad
a person or thing entrusted to the care of someone
an official instruction; especially one given by a judge to a jury regarding points of law

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指提供服务时索取的费用，也指货物的价格、价钱。
指生产某东西的成本，也泛指商品的价格，可与 price 换用。
常指实际支付的费用总数额，有时也指钱的花费。
侧重指旅行时所付的车、船费等费用。
普通用词，正式或非正式场合，私人或法律上均可用。被指控的情节可轻可重。常与 of 连用。
常与 accuse 换用，但 charge 多指较严重的错误或罪行，而且往往向法庭提出正式起诉。
作费用讲时泛指生活方方面面的花费。
指支付的服务费、手续费等附加费用。
指用于交通的花费。
特指通过道路、桥梁时需支付的费用。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 责任; 承担; 负责

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a price asked for goods or services

examination_example.sentence: He offered to fix bikes free of <highlight>charge</highlight> for anyone who needed it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他为任何需要的人免费修理自行车。

examination_example.sentence: At first the price of single copies was seldom a penny—usually two or three cents was <highlight>charged</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 起初，单份报纸的价格很少有一便士的——通常售价是两三美分。

examination_example.sentence: Admission is at normal <highlight>charges</highlight> and you don't need to book.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 门票按正常收费，不需要预定。

sense_info_list.en: the responsibility of taking care or control of someone or something
sense_info_list.zh: 责任; 承担; 负责

examination_example.sentence: There are plenty of other benefits, too; it doesn't <highlight>charge</highlight> city tax; it has both air conditioning and a heater for the rooms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有很多其他的好处；它不收取城市税；房间里有空调和加热器。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指提供服务时索取的费用，也指货物的价格、价钱。
指生产某东西的成本，也泛指商品的价格，可与 price 换用。
常指实际支付的费用总数额，有时也指钱的花费。
侧重指旅行时所付的车、船费等费用。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 责任; 承担; 负责

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It can <highlight>charge</highlight> a radio three or four times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以给收音机充电三到四次。

examination_example.sentence: For example, some electric cars can travel only 60 to 120 miles on a full <highlight>charge</highlight> (充电).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，一些电动汽车充满电后只能行驶60到120英里。

examination_example.sentence: Gas cars can cover a longer distance on a full tank than electric cars on a full <highlight>charge</highlight>．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加满油的汽车比充满电的电动汽车行驶的距离更长。

sense_info_list.en: a price asked for goods or services

examination_example.sentence: If customers leave too much food uneaten, restaurants can <highlight>charge</highlight> (收费) them for food waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果顾客留下太多食物没吃，餐馆可以向他们收取食物浪费的费用。

examination_example.sentence: What does the underlined word “<highlight>charges</highlight>” mean?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 带下划线的单词“费用”是什么意思？

examination_example.sentence: At first, we were busy having fun, and <highlight>charged</highlight> (支付) everything to my credit cards instead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一开始，我们忙着玩乐，把所有费用都记在了我的信用卡上。

sense_info_list.en: the responsibility of taking care or control of someone or something
sense_info_list.zh: 责任; 承担; 负责

examination_example.sentence: Remember, whenever you want to draw on a sidewalk, always ask an adult in <highlight>charge</highlight> for permission before you draw.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记住，无论何时你想在人行道上画画，在画画之前一定要征得负责人的许可。

examination_example.sentence: Who is in <highlight>charge</highlight> of the summer concert?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谁负责这次夏季音乐会？

examination_example.sentence: People in <highlight>charge</highlight> of the schools asked the police to check and make sure that students weren't leaving for vacations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学校负责人要求警方进行检查，确保学生没有外出度假。

examination_example.sentence: He kept silent to the <highlight>charges</highlight> against him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他对针对他的指控保持沉默。

examination_example.sentence: Before I could reply, more dirty <highlight>charges</highlight> poured up on me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还没来得及回答，就有更多肮脏的指控涌向我。

examination_example.sentence: While he was running for Governor, many articles on newspapers poured untrue <highlight>charges</highlight> on him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在他竞选州长期间，报纸上的许多文章对他进行了不实的指控。
